Edinburgh Photographic Society

Membership

Founded in 1861, Edinburgh Photographic Society welcomes photographers of all levels. Joining our community provides access to a range of benefits, facilities, and opportunities to develop your photographic skills.

Membership Benefits

  • Access to our extensive programme of lectures and demonstrations
  • Participate in club competitions and exhibitions
  • Use our well-equipped studio facilities
  • Access to our traditional darkroom
  • Join special interest groups focused on different photography genres
  • Access our photographic library
  • Connect with a community of photographers of all levels
  • Opportunities to learn and develop your photography skills

Membership Fees

Our membership year runs from September to August. Current fees for the 2025/26 season are:

Membership Type Annual Fee
Full Member £85
Family Member £125
Student Member £45
Junior Member (under 18) £25
